item.description:
In keeping with the Collective Presidential Race Debate circuit, we thought it only fitting that we also hold an Election Day Results party at the Congress Tavern!

Please GO VOTE first, then come on down, have some cheer and chat with friends as we watch the future of the next 4 years unfold in front of us. We'll either cry in our glasses or raise them to cheer. Either way, we'll have a beer! - hey, that rhymes!

This is going to be a close one and the finish is sure to be dramatic at least or at best!

Many thanks to the folks at Congress Tavern who have generously offered to give us a FREE BUFFET to tide us over as the results come in!

Hope to see you there!

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Val is hosting this one! Please look at her picture!!!
item.name: Election Day Results Party at the Congress Tavern!
